crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiTCPIPServer
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiTCPIPServer
crown.desc: This CSK module provides an easy access to TCP/IP Server functionality and provides a UI for all relevant features. + The main externally useful features are following: + {empty} + Typically the features of this module are used like this (check also main script of this module): + {empty} + **1. Setup the TCP/IP server configuration** + - Select the server via 'setSelectedInstance'. If needed, add a new instance via 'addInstance'. + - Setup the interface, port, framing, etc. via its related 'set...' function. + - Start / stop to wait for clients via 'setListenState'. + {empty} + NOTE! Server must be restarted with "setListenState(false)" - "setListenState(true)" to apply new settings. + {empty} + **3. Receive data** + It is possible to receive data via dynamically created "CSK_MultiTCPIPServer.OnReceivedDataNUM" events or "client whitelists" (see chapter 5). + {empty} + **4. Data transmission** + It is possible to transmit data via dynamically created "CSK_MultiTCPIPServer.sendDataNUM" functions or "client broadcasts" (see chapter 6). + {empty} + **5. Client whitelists** + Whitelists can be used to filter for data of specific data sources. It is possible to set an IP filter for each created whitelist. + - Set name of a whitelist to be created via 'setClientWhitelistName'. + - Create a new whitelist via 'createClientWhitelist'. + - Select the whitelist via 'setSelectedClientWhitelist' and delete it with 'deleteClientWhitelist'. + - Now you can add IP addresses to this whitelist via 'setIPAddressToAddToClientWhitelist'. + Incoming data will be provided via event 'CSK_MultiTCPIPServer.OnReceivedDataNUM_WHITELISTNAME' ('NUM' and 'WHITELISTNAME' will be replaced by instance number and name of whitelist). + {empty} + **6. Client broadcasts** + Broadcasts can be used to send data only to specific clients. It is possible to set individual IP filter for each created broadcast. + - Set name of a broadcast to be created via 'setClientBroadcastName'. + - Create a new broadcast via 'createClientBroadcast'. + - Select the broadcast via 'setSelectedClientBroadcast' and delete it with 'deleteClientBroadcast'. + - Now you can add IP addresses to this broadcast via 'setIPAddressToAddToClientBroadcast'. + A created broadcast can be used by calling the dynamically created 'CSK_MultiTCPIPServer.sendDataNUM_BROADCASTNAME' functions ('NUM' and 'BROADCASTNAME' will be replaced by instance number and name of the broadcast). +

enum.name: FramingType
enum.desc: Framing type of TCPIP server for Rx or Tx data.

item.desc: Start framing is STX, end framing is ETX.
item.name: STX_ETX

item.desc: Custom type where user can set ant start / end symbols.
item.name: Custom

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Event to provide list of created instances.

event.name: OnNewProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: objectNo

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify if new instance is selected.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewValueUpdateNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to sync paramters between instance threads and Controller part of module. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToUpdate1"). +

param.desc: Instance new value is coming from.
param.name: instance

param.desc: Name of the paramter to update/sync.
param.name: parameter

param.desc: Optionally if internal parameter should be used for internal objects.
param.name: selectedObject

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to forward data from instance thread to Controller part of module, e.g. to forward values to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToForward1"). +

param.desc: Eventname to use to forward value.
param.name: eventname

event.name: OnNewPort
event.desc: Event to provide port number.

event.name: OnNewInterface
event.desc: Event to provide the selected Interface for active server.

param.desc: The interface TCP/IP server listens to.
param.name: Interface

event.name: OnNewRxFraming
event.desc: Event to provide the selected Rx framing type.

event.name: OnNewTxFraming
event.desc: Event to provide the selected Tx framing type.

event.name: OnNewRxStart
event.desc: Event to provide the Rx Start hex symbol.

event.name: OnNewRxStop
event.desc: Event to provide the Rx stop hex symbol.

event.name: OnNewTxStart
event.desc: Event to provide the Tx Start hex symbol.

event.name: OnNewTxStop
event.desc: Event to provide the Tx Stop hex symbol.

event.name: OnNewMaxConnections
event.desc: Event to provide the max connections value.

event.name: OnNewTransmitTimeout
event.desc: Event to provide the transmittion timeout value.

event.name: OnNewACKTimeout
event.desc: Event to provide the current acknowledgement timeout value.

event.name: OnNewTransmitBuffer
event.desc: Event to provide the transmittion buffer value.

event.name: OnNewRxFramingBufferSize
event.desc: Event to provide the Rx buffer size.

event.name: OnNewTxFramingBufferSize
event.desc: Event to provide the Tx buffer size.

event.name: OnNewConnectedClientsNumber
event.desc: Event to provide the connected clients number.

event.name: OnNewInterfaceList
event.desc: Event to provide the list of available ethernet interfaces.

param.desc: List of interfaces in JSON format.
param.name: interfaceList

event.name: OnNewRxFramingList
event.desc: Event to provide the list of available Rx framing types.

param.desc: List of framings in JSON format.
param.name: RxFramingList

event.name: OnNewTxFramingList
event.desc: Event to provide the list of available Tx framing types.

param.desc: List of framings in JSON format.
param.name: TxFramingList

event.name: OnNewConnectedClientsTable
event.desc: Event to provide dynamic table content with connected clients.

param.desc: Connected clients table in JSON format.
param.name: newData

event.name: OnNewListenState
event.desc: Event to provide the active state of server.

param.desc: Active state to show in UI.
param.name: newState

event.name: OnRxFramingDisabled
event.desc: Event to disable/enable editing Rx Framing field in UI.

event.name: OnTxFramingDisabled
event.desc: Event to disable/enable editing Tx Framing field in UI.

event.name: OnNewServerIP
event.desc: Event to provide the server IP address.

event.name: OnNewSelectedClientWhitelist
event.desc: Event to provide the name of the selected client whitelist.

param.desc: Name of the selected client whitelist.
param.name: clientWhitelistName

event.name: OnNewListClientWhitelist
event.desc: Event to provide the list of all created client whitelists.

param.desc: List of client whitelists in JSON format.
param.name: jsonClientWhitelistsList

event.name: OnNewClientWhitelistEventName
event.desc: Event to provide the event name of the selected client whitelist.

event.name: OnNewClientWhitelistTableContent
event.desc: Event to provide IP filter table of the selected client whitelist.

event.name: OnNewSelectedTab
event.desc: Event to provide the current selected tab ID.

event.name: OnNewStatusClientWhitelistSelected
event.desc: Event to provide status if any client whitelist is selected.

event.name: OnNewGenericReceivedDataEventName
event.desc: Event to provide the name of event notified when server receives any data from any client.

event.name: OnNewGenericSendDataFunctionName
event.desc: Event to provide the name of function to be called to send any data to all clients.

event.name: OnNewTestDataToSend
event.desc: Event to provide the data to be sent for testing purposes.

event.name: OnNewListClientBroadcast
event.desc: Event to provide the list of all created client broadcasts.

param.desc: List of client broadcasts in JSON format.
param.name: jsonBroadcastList

event.name: OnNewSelectedClientBroadcast
event.desc: Event to provide the name of the selected client broadcast.

param.desc: Name of the selected client broadcast.
param.name: clientBroadcastName

event.name: OnNewClientBroadcastFunctionName
event.desc: Event to provide the function name of the selected client broadcast.

event.name: OnNewClientBroadcastTableContent
event.desc: Event to provide IP filter table of the selected client broadcast.

event.name: OnNewClientBroadcastTestDataToSend
event.desc: Event to provide the data to be sent for testing purposes as the selected client broadcast.

event.name: OnNewStatusClientBroadcastSelected
event.desc: Event to provide the status if any client broadcast is selected.

event.name: OnNewLog
event.desc: Notfiy latest log.

event.name: OnNewStatusAddIPViaList
event.desc: Notify status if IP for filter should be added via list selection in UI.

event.name: OnReceivedDataNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide received data of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnReceivedData1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnReceivedDataNUM_WHITELISTNAME
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide received data of client whitelist of instance. + 'NUM' and 'WHITELISTNAME' will be replaced by the number of instance and name of client whitelist (e.g. "OnReceivedData1_whitelist1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewStatusFlowConfigPriority
event.desc: Notify if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configurations.

event.name: OnNewEventToForwardList
event.desc: Notify list of events to register to and to forward its content to all connected TCP/IP clients.

event.name: OnNewStatusForwardEventForBroadcasts
event.desc: Notify if config of forward events in UI is for broadcasts.

event.name: OnNewClientWhitelistName
event.desc: Notify name of whitelist to create.

event.name: OnNewClientBroadcastName
event.desc: Notify name of broadcast to create.

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleVersion
event.desc: Notify version of module.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

function.name: setListenState
function.desc: Function to turn server on or off.

param.desc: New listen state, true if active.
param.name: newState

function.name: setPort
function.desc: Function to set port, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

function.name: setInterface
function.desc: Sets device's interface from UI, server must be restarted to apply the settings (see 'setListenState').

function.name: setRxFraming
function.desc: Set Rx Framing type, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Framing type of recived data to be used by server.
param.name: newRxFraming

function.name: setTxFraming
function.desc: Set Tx framing type, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Framing of transmitted data to be used by server.
param.name: newTxFraming

function.name: setRxStart
function.desc: Set RxStart frame from UI, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Hex symbol of a start frame of recived data to be used by server.
param.name: newRxStart

function.name: setRxStop
function.desc: Set RxStop frame from UI, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Hex symbol of a stop frame of recived data to be used by server.
param.name: newRxStop

function.name: setTxStart
function.desc: Set TxStart frame, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Hex symbol of a start frame of transmitted data to be used by server.
param.name: newTxStart

function.name: setTxStop
function.desc: Set TxStop frame, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Hex symbol of a stop frame of transmitted data to be used by server.
param.name: newTxStop

function.name: setMaxConnections
function.desc: Set limit of connections, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Maximum number of connected clients for server.
param.name: newMaxConnections

function.name: setTransmitionTimeout
function.desc: Set data transmition timeout, server must be restarted to apply the settings.

function.name: setACKTimeout
function.desc: Sets from UI the maximum time interval, in milliseconds, that a transmitted packet may stay unacknowledged before the connection is terminated.

param.desc: Timeout for packet ACKs, in milliseconds.
param.name: newACKTimeout

function.name: setTransmitionBuffer
function.desc: Sets the size of the socket send buffer. Server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Size of the buffer, in bytes
param.name: newTransmitionBuffer

function.name: setRxBuffer
function.desc: Sets the Rx size of the internal framing parser buffer from UI. Server must be restarted to apply the settings.

param.desc: Framing buffer size for receiving data.
param.name: newRxBuffer

function.name: setTxBuffer
function.desc: Sets the Tx size of the internal framing parser buffer. Server must be restarted to apply the settings.

function.name: selectConnectedClient
function.desc: Select row in the connected clients dynamic table. Used to copy the IP Address of the selected client into client whitelist / broadcast filter list.

param.desc: Selected row from the connected clients table in JSON format.
param.name: selectedRow

function.name: getInterfaceIP
function.desc: Get the IP address of the selected server.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

param.desc: [Optional] Set to TRUE if the data should NOT be saved immediately after sending.
param.name: noDataSave

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/ device boot up.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: setSelectedInstance
function.desc: Select one of the multiple instances.

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get the amount of created instances of this module.

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: createClientWhitelist
function.desc: Create a new client whitelist with default name.

function.name: setClientWhitelistName
function.desc: Set a new name of a whitelist to be created.

function.name: setSelectedClientWhitelist
function.desc: Select client whitelist to edit.

function.name: deleteClientWhitelist
function.desc: Delete the selected client whitelist.

function.name: setIPAddressToAddToClientWhitelist
function.desc: Set IP address to be added to list of clients from which server will wait for a message.

function.name: deleteClientWhitelistIPAddress
function.desc: Delete the selected IP address from the list of the selected client whitelist.

param.desc: JSON content of the selected row of the dynamic with IP Address to delete.
param.name: jsonRowToDelete

function.name: setSelectedTab
function.desc: Set selcetd settings tab in UI.

function.name: setTestDataToSend
function.desc: Set data to be sent to clients for testing purposes.

function.name: sendTestData
function.desc: Function to send the pre-defined test data (see setTestDataToSend).

function.name: setClientBroadcastName
function.desc: Set a name to create a new client broadcast via 'createClientBroadcast'.

function.name: setSelectedClientBroadcast
function.desc: Select client broadcast to edit.

function.name: createClientBroadcast
function.desc: Create a new client broadcast with preset name (see 'setClientBroadcastName').

function.name: deleteClientBroadcast
function.desc: Delete the selected client broadcast.

function.name: setIPAddressToAddToClientBroadcast
function.desc: Set IP address to be added to list of clients to which the server send the message.

function.name: deleteClientBroadcastFilterIPAddress
function.desc: Delete the selected IP address from the list of the selected client broadcast.

param.desc: JSON content of the selected row of the dynamic with IP Address to delete.
param.name: jsonRowToDelete

function.name: sendClientBroadcastTestData
function.desc: Function to send the pre-defined test data (see 'setClientBroadcastTestDataToSend') as the selected client broadcast.

function.name: setClientBroadcastTestDataToSend
function.desc: Set data to be sent to clients filtered in the selected broadcast for testing purposes.

function.name: getConnectedClientsIPsNUM
function.desc: Function to get list of IP addresses of the connected clients. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "getConnectedClientsIPs1"). +

return.desc: Array with IP addresses of the connected clients.
return.name: connectedClientsIPs

function.name: setAddIPViaList
function.desc: Function to activate to select IP via UI list for filter.

function.name: sendDataNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to send data on instance to clients. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "sendData1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".

param.desc: Optional list of IP addresses of the clients to send the data to.
param.name: ipList

function.name: sendDataNUM_BROADCASTNAME
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to send data on instance via client broadcast. + 'NUM' and 'BROADCASTNAME' will be replaced by the numeric identifier of the instance and name of client broadcast(e.g. "sendData1_broadcast1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".

function.name: setFlowConfigPriority
function.desc: Function to configure if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configuration.

function.name: clearFlowConfigRelevantConfiguration
function.desc: Function to clear FlowConfig relevant configurations.

function.name: selectEventToForwardViaUI
function.desc: Select an event to forward the content of its first parameter to all TCP/IP clients via UI.

function.name: addEventToForward
function.desc: Add an event to register to and to forward the content of its first parameter (as string) to all connected TCP/IP clients.

param.desc: Name of event to register to.
param.name: event

function.name: addEventToForwardViaUI
function.desc: Add event to register to and forward content (first event parameter as string) to all connected TCPI/IP cleints via UI (event needs to be prefilled on UI / via "setEventToForward").

function.name: deleteEventToForward
function.desc: Remove event to forward content.

function.name: deleteEventToForwardViaUI
function.desc: Remove event preselected via UI.

function.name: setEventToForward
function.desc: Preset event to register to and forward content to all connected TCP/IP clients via UI.

function.name: setForwardBroadcastEvent
function.desc: Function to set if adding/deleting forwarding events in UI is for broadcasts.

function.name: getStatusModuleActive
function.desc: Function to get status if module is active.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: getParameters
function.desc: Function to get all parameters of the client in JSON format.

param.desc: Number of instance to get parameters from.
param.name: instanceNo

function.name: resetModule
function.desc: Function to reset main configuration of module.

crown.name: MultiTCPIPServer_FC
crown.desc: Crown to provide CSK_FlowConfig relevant features.

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

param.desc: Optional client boradcast to use (will transmit data only to defined clients).
param.name: ClientBroadcast

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: transmit
function.desc: Set source of incoming data to forward via TCP/IP.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
Source1 of data to forward via TCP/IP.
Parameter: 1: Data content (STRING)
param.name: source1

param.desc:
Source2 of data to forward via TCP/IP.
Parameter: 1: Data content (STRING)
param.name: source2

param.desc:
Source3 of data to forward via TCP/IP.
Parameter: 1: Data content (STRING)
param.name: source3

param.desc:
Source4 of data to forward via TCP/IP.
Parameter: 1: Data content (STRING)
param.name: source4

event.name: OnNewData
event.desc: Provide incoming TCP/IP data.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

param.desc: Optionally client whitelist to use (will filter for messages of defined clients by defined IPs).
param.name: ClientWhitelist

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: register
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig register function.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle
